pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 21, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario  

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Vancouver, Kennedy Stewart.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 3:00 p.m.
